security.title: Security and Access Control
security.intro: Our security and access control system offers advanced user permission and access management, ensuring protection against unauthorized access and potential threats.
security.protocols: With stringent security protocols and continuous system monitoring, we ensure the highest level of data security for our clients.
security.tools: Our threat response tools are constantly updated, allowing for quick identification and neutralization of potential threats, ensuring operational continuity and security.
security.unauthorized: This view is only for admin

warehouse.title: Warehouse management
warehouse.intro: The warehouse management system allows for accurate monitoring of inventory levels and generating alerts when stocks run out or products are approaching expiry dates.
warehouse.protocols: Efficient management of product storage places ensures optimal use of available warehouse space and facilitates quick location and access to the necessary goods.
warehouse.tools: Our internal logistics solutions focus on optimizing the arrangement of goods in the warehouse, which contributes to increasing the efficiency of warehousing and order picking processes.

sales_and_orders.title: Sales and Order Management
sales_and_orders.intro: Our sales and order management system enables you to efficiently receive and process customer orders, ensuring a smooth flow from order placement to delivery.
sales_and_orders.mainInfo: The component responsible for managing the customer and delivery addresses of the ordered goods.
sales_and_orders.add_client: Do you want to add a new client?
sales_and_orders.confirm_delete_client: Are you sure you want to delete this client? This action cannot be undone.
sales_and_orders.add_address: Do you want to add a new address?
sales_and_orders.order_explementation: To place an order for a customer:
sales_and_orders.step_1: 1. Select the customer you will be serving.
sales_and_orders.step_2: 2. Select the delivery address or add a new one.
sales_and_orders.step_3: 3. Select the products to be ordered in the Products tab.
sales_and_orders.step_4: 4. Confirm all data in the Basket tab.

accounting.title: Finance and Accounting
accounting.intro: Our financial system offers comprehensive payment and cash flow management, enabling effective transaction monitoring and optimization of operating costs.
accounting.protocols: Financial transactions are processed automatically, which ensures speed and accuracy in accounting and minimizes the risk of errors.
accounting.tools: The system enables the generation of detailed financial reports and balance sheets, offering full transparency of the company's finances and supporting strategic business decisions.

data_analysis.title: Data Analysis and Reporting
data_analysis.intro: Our data analysis and reporting tools enable you to generate comprehensive sales, financial and operational reports, providing key information for the decision-making process.

human_resources.title: Human Resources Management (HR)
human_resources.intro: Our HR system enables comprehensive management of recruitment processes, from candidate selection to onboarding, ensuring effective integration of new employees with the organization's culture.
human_resources.protocols: We offer an advanced remuneration and benefits management system that allows personalization of employee packages and automation of settlement processes.
human_resources.tools: The system also supports the planning and management of training, promoting the development of employee competences and increasing their commitment and work efficiency.
human_resources.subject: Subject
human_resources.confirm_delete_question: Are you sure you want to delete this message?
human_resources.email_box_description: This email box is used for receiving business messages. Check all incoming messages here and manage them according to applicable rules.
human_resources.no_new_emails: Currently, there are no new messages in the inbox. Please check back later or contact the administrator if you believe there should be messages.
human_resources.employee_description: The table contains a full list of employees along with basic information such as first name, last name, department, and position. This allows for a quick overview and access to key data regarding each employee in the organization.
human_resources.employee_note: If you need detailed information about a specific employee or need to edit data, please contact the HR department. The list is regularly updated to ensure accuracy of the information.
human_resources.message_center_description: The message sending center allows mass emailing to employees of different departments, individual selected people, or everyone in the organization. Use this feature to efficiently manage communication and inform employees about important matters.
human_resources.message_center_note: If you need help creating messages or configuring recipients, refer to the documentation or contact the support department. Before sending important messages, we recommend sending a test email to ensure everything is working correctly.

warning_page.permissions: You do not have permissions to access this component!
warning_page.user_list: Below is a list of employees you can contact regarding a given matter!

products_card.title: Products
products_card.product_support: Explore our extensive range of premium copy paper, designed to meet the high-volume printing needs of large and medium-sized businesses.

basket_card.title: Basket
basket_card.cart_contents: Check the items in your cart before placing the order.

orders_card.title: Orders
orders_card.cart_contents: Before processing orders, review the individual customer orders.

notification.error: The task could not be completed
notification.deleting_error: An error occurred while deleting the data. Please check if it is linked to any existing orders and try again.
notification.order_delete_error: An order in progress cannot be deleted!
notification.name: First Name
notification.addres_added: Your new delivery address has been saved!
notification.new_addres_question: Do you want to add new address to selected clients?
notification.client_data_saved: Customer details and delivery address have been saved!

address.confirm_message: Do you want to create an order for the selected data?
address.confirm_delete_address: Are you sure you want to delete this address? This action cannot be undone.
